member.name: T:NDepend.TFS.Activities.DownloadCoverage
member.summary: Download code coverage data of the specify Build from the TFS data store into the specify folder. Since the background 'Team Foundation Server Coverage Analysis' job could be running when this activity is executing, request TFS data store every 5ms until specify timeout to get data. If you use this activity on the current Build, it should be scheduled after tests execution and before NDepend execution.
